rules_text: Look at the top X cards of your library, where X is 1 plus the number of differently named tokens you control. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
notes:
New card — Replaced Cass’ Clairvoyance

Wanted Thirst for Sustainance to be our difinitive divination. Also wanted to give differently-named tokens at least one piece at common.
